product_name: The North Face Flex Crew Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The lightweight, short-sleeve Flex Crew shirt from The North Face wicks sweat away from your skin and features mesh panels to help keep you dry and cool when you're working out or riding your bike. Mesh fabric in the high-heat areas under your arms and along your sides ensures you stay as comfortable as possible. Mesh areas also feature an innovative silver salt treatment that fights odors. You'll run farther without chafing thanks to the flatlock seams. Slight droptail hem covers your lower back when you're bending over your handlebars or doing pull-ups at the gym. A UPF rating of 30 helps protect your skin in bright sun. The North Face Flex Crew shirt features a relaxed fit. Closeout.
short_description: The lightweight, short-sleeve Flex Crew shirt from The North Face wicks sweat away from your skin and features mesh panels to help keep you dry and cool when you're working out or riding your bike.
